channel.title: Not letting me log on
channel.description: I click log on and it waits for about 10 seconds, logs me on so i see the chat box, inventory, map etc....then says error connecting to server...and this comes up on my run file... java.net.SocketException: Software caused connection abort: rec at java.net.SocketInputStream.socketRead0(Native Method at java.net.SocketInputStream.read(Unknown Source) at java.net.SocketInputStream.read(Unknown Source) at client.packetProcess(client.java:20876) at client.packetSending(client.java:20845) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:190) at server.main(server.java:52) pimpscape Server [fatal] - exception HELP!! pleasasee?

item.title: Not letting me log on
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

italy544:

well if this is a 317 server, go to ur files and find GUI.JAVA when u find that search for the ip adress and when u find that replace it with 127.0.0.1 (local host) (if ur the hoster)

already done :S

Read full topic

item.title: Not letting me log on
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

I click log on and it waits for about 10 seconds, logs me on so i see the chat box, inventory, map etc…then says error connecting to server…and this comes up on my run file…
java.net.SocketException: Software caused connection abort: rec
at java.net.SocketInputStream.socketRead0(Native Method
at java.net.SocketInputStream.read(Unknown Source)
at java.net.SocketInputStream.read(Unknown Source)
at client.packetProcess(client.java:20876)
at client.packetSending(client.java:20845)
at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:190)
at server.main(server.java:52)
pimpscape Server [fatal] - exception
HELP!!
pleasasee?

Read full topic
